Executive Chef

Drives customer satisfaction, and maintains client relationships through rounding.
Ensures compliance to food safety, sanitation, and overall workplace safety standards.
Supervises, staffs, trains, conducts applicable rounding and manages the performance of the department to include the Food Service Supervisors and/or front line staff regarding food presentation, quality, cost control and food safety and sanitation.
Manages and controls resources and materials to ensure quality, adequacy of supply and cost control within budgetary guidelines.
Responsible for managing the process of purchasing, receiving, scheduling, inventory control and managing food production activities in compliance with Sodexo food production systems.
Assist in menu planning, pre-costing and post-costing.

description: Menu development, one-on-one consultation with customers, designing menus, work scheduling, complete budget for bistro food outlet.
On and off-campus catering.
Increased business by 20% over 6 months focusing on light fare with locally grown ingredients and regional flavors.
Implemented staff training program, including task competency indexing for increased labor efficiency, flavor development cooking techniques, and food presentation concepts.
Inventory handling, management, and rotation in accordance with HACCP, food cost controls, and food quality standards.
Delivered strong operational performance by executing against Sodexo and regulatory agency standards and programs.
Monitored operations, completed assessments, and action plans to provide optimal food quality and meal service.
Maintained client relationships through rounding.
Ensured compliance to food safety, sanitation, and overall workplace safety standards.
Supervised, staffed, trained, managed department performance regarding food presentation, quality, cost control, and food safety and sanitation.
Managed resources and materials to ensure quality, adequacy of supply, and cost control within budgetary guidelines.
Managed purchasing, receiving, scheduling, inventory control, and food production activities in compliance with Sodexo food production systems.
Assisted in menu planning, pre-costing, and post-costing.
Designed premium menus, developed recipes, and provided culinary education for kitchen staff outlining events and live cooking demonstrations.
Culinary nutrition consultant for health improvement results for patients and staff.
Successfully designed and implemented a menu promoting conscious cuisine standards in culinary outlets.
Helped develop nutritional standards for all food outlets.
Received high positive guest feedback surveys and a 65% sales increase over a 5-year period.
Implemented purchasing protocol and procedures, securing competitive pricing from purveyors.
Aggressively fought waste and promoted cross-utilization to maintain food cost below budget by 1-2.5 percentage points.
Received positive write-ups from Kindred Magazine and Tucson newspapers for outstanding, clean kitchen outlets by Arizona health department.

Developed and enforced Standards and Procedures Handbook for service and production, resulting in consistent standard task execution by team members and a 20% reduction of labor costs over a 5-year period.
Assisted in the direction of a $1.5 million renovation of dining facilities and kitchens, including four restaurants, Culinary Learning Center, bistro, retail space, and stations buffet.
